name: Trapped in Space
description:
Bob, a young droid, Is trapped in a space ship. He has 30 seconds to escape. On the way he needs to solve the puzzles to reach the escape pods to escape. Use your up, right and left controls on your keyboard to maneuverer your character.

Make sure to send me your scores in the comments.  Mine was about 28ish

Good luck and have fun!

Made by Oliver Greening

I hope this will inspire you to follow your dreams and that you can do anything you set your mind to. 

This was made in the Blender Game Engine 2.79
